message.body: Listen are you takin the bus to the hampton area
We shoild rake it together!!!!! should* take*
Lmao! Are you coming to the hamptons for after prom ????
No I'm not but we should take it together anyway.
Awwww well ok! We are taking the 9 am bus leaving from 40th and 3rd ave
I was being really sarcastic Will omfg of course I'm going to the hamptons for afterprom...
LOL BUT OMG UR A JUNIOR
shush don't be rude. But ew idk if I wanna go all the way to manhattan at 9 that's gross.
Yeah but like that's whats happening
YOURE RUINING LIVES BUDDY........should I go see a show monica is in and then go at 4?
If that works better for you then yes
It doesn't but idk its just a moral dilemma because monia wants me to go but I'm not interested and I don't wanna go alone and I don't wanna pay $18 ugh
Right. It would be nice of you to go, and the hamptons will still be there after the show
So who are you taking it with though
Most people are taking that bus. Me Julia Sasha nick dima joe etc
Oh okay because my dads annoying me and he's like telling me to go with someone and "let me drive you to their house because I don't trust you" like wow rude.
Ok. Actually I think joe is going at 11 but most are going at 9. Tell yo pops to chill
He's so ugh I caNT IM ONLY A CHILD
